languages.text: "Возможно, мы с Урбендом далеко не всегда находили общий язык, но его верность Леди Теодоре была безусловной, и {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}завершилась{/d} так... бесславно".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, мы с Урбендом далеко не всегда находили общий язык, но его верность леди Теодоре была безусловной, и завершилась так... бесславно. Надеюсь, смерть рода Дравстем станет предостережением для остальных, склонных к ереси аристократов".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d} so... ignominiously."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, мы с Урбендом далеко не всегда находили общий язык, но его верность Леди Теодоре была безусловной, и {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}завершилась{/d} так... бесславно".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps me and Urbend didn't always see eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and ended so... ignominious."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps me and Urbend didn't always see eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and ended so... ignominious."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps Urbend and I didn't always see eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was unconditional, and ended so... ignominiously."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps Urbend and I didn't always see eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was unconditional, and ended so... ignominiously."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it ended so... ignominiously."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d} so... ignominiously."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「アーベンドと私は絶えず意見の相違を見ていたかもしれません。ですが、レディ・シオドーラに無条件の忠誠を誓っていたというのに、{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}最後{/d}は実に…卑しむべきものでした」
languages.original_text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d} so... ignominiously."

traits.locale_text: 「アーベンドと私は絶えず意見の相違を見ていたかもしれません。ですが、レディ・シオドーラに無条件の忠誠を誓っていたというのに、最後は実に…卑しむべきものでした」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我和厄本常常意见相左，但他对西奥多拉夫人的忠诚毋庸置疑。我真没想到，他竟然会落得……如此不堪的{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}下场{/d}。”
languages.original_text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d} so... ignominiously."

traits.locale_text: “我和厄本常常意见相左，但他对西奥多拉夫人的忠诚毋庸置疑。我真没想到……他竟然会落得如此不堪的下场。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Urbend et moi n'avons pas toujours été d'accord sur tout, mais il faisait preuve d'une loyauté sans faille envers dame Théodora. Quel dommage que cela ait dû {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}finir{/d} ainsi ! »
languages.original_text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d} so... ignominiously."

traits.locale_text: « Urbend et moi n'avons pas toujours été d'accord sur tout, mais il faisait preuve d'une loyauté sans faille envers dame Théodora. Quel dommage que cela ait dû finir ainsi ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Puede que Urbend y yo no siempre estuviéramos de acuerdo, pero su lealtad a lady Theodora era incondicional, y {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}acabó{/d} de forma... humillante».
languages.original_text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d} so... ignominiously."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que Urbend y yo no siempre estuviéramos de acuerdo, pero su lealtad a Lady Theodora era incondicional, y acabó de forma... humillante».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht waren Urbend und ich nicht immer einer Meinung, aber seine Loyalität Lady Theodora gegenüber war bedingungslos, und sie endete so ... schmachvoll."
languages.original_text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it ended so... ignominiously."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht waren Urbend und ich nicht immer einer Meinung, aber seine Loyalität Lady Theodora gegenüber war bedingungslos, und sie endete so ... schmachvoll."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Urbend'le aramız iyi olmasa da Leydi Theodora'ya öyle sadıktı ki... Lakin sadakatinin {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}sonu{/d} da bir o kadar utanç verici oldu."
languages.original_text: "Urbend and I may not have always seen eye to eye, but his loyalty to Lady Theodora was absolute, and it {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}ended{/d} so... ignominiously."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend'le aramız iyi olmasa da Leydi Theodora'ya öyle sadıktı ki... Lakin sadakatinin {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}sonu{/d} da bir o kadar utanç verici oldu."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
